short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The 2-Hour Job Search extension eases the ability to add contact information to a list of companies for job-seeking students.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The 2-Hour Job Search was a book written by Steven Dalton that emphasized the point of creating a LAMP list. L = List, A = Alumni, M = Motivation, P = Posting. It is a list largely composed of companies for which you want to work for, have current job postings and have alumni/connections. This extension helps with the connections part of the process. When on designated pages and with one click of a button, the important information for a potential contact is split into separate fields (First Name, Last Name, Company Name, etc.), thus allowing for easy editing of the pre-filled fields and adding of the contact to your lamp list.
